meanings.definition: A person who is involved in marketing.
meanings.sent1: The marketeer created eye-catching advertisements to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: The marketeer attended a conference to learn new marketing strategies.
meanings.sent3: The marketeer joked that they could sell ice to an Eskimo with their marketing skills.
meanings.sent4: The marketeer was a master at convincing people to buy things they didn't know they needed.
meanings.sent5: The marketeer's creativity and persuasion made them stand out in the marketing industry.

meanings.definition: To promote or sell a product or service.
meanings.sent1: She decided to marketeer the new product through social media campaigns.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a team to marketeer their latest line of products.
meanings.sent3: He marketeered the idea so well that everyone wanted to buy into it.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur marketeered her services with enthusiasm and dedication.
meanings.sent5: They marketeered the event with such finesse that it became the talk of the town.
